'''''Mallorn'' 48''' is the forty-eighth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s biannual journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)|Mallorn]]'', published in Autumn [[2009]].

** ''Gates of Moria''

*** By: [[John Garth]]

*** By: Joel Franz

*** By: [[David Doughan]]

*** By: [[Patricia Reynolds|Pat Reynolds]]
